creator: HOTEL DE GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Find the perfect hotel for your trip with the HOTEL DE app!

HOTEL DE is the ideal companion for your trip. Benefit from intuitive and fast hotel booking as well as customized solutions before, during and after your hotel stay. HOTEL DE negotiates special conditions with hotels for registered My HOTEL DE Members with up to 30 percent discount. Flexibility is especially important for business travelers, as appointments can change spontaneously. That's why we already show you in the hotel results list at a glance which hotels can be canceled free of charge.

Highest quality, low prices and only real hotel reviews.

Detailed hotel descriptions, informative photos and videos, and around five million hotel reviews make it easy to search for hotels in the app. On the hotel results list, you can see the most important hotel information at a glance and can conveniently filter or sort it according to your preferences and wishes. The special thing about the hotel ratings: Only guests who have booked and stayed at the respective hotel can leave a rating. This means that you can see real hotel ratings for each hotel.

Exclusive advantages for My HOTEL DE Members

With a free My HOTEL DE account, you benefit from many exclusive advantages in the app, such as the HOTEL DE Business Discount. This allows you to save up to 30% or more at the best hotels. In addition, HOTEL DE negotiates free additional services such as parking spaces directly at the hotel, free upgrades to the next higher room category or late check-out. Under "My Bookings" in your personal My HOTEL DE account, you can also easily change your bookings flexibly on the go, cancel them or simply view the hotel details, such as address, check-in times or phone number of the hotel. This way, you have your hotel bookings with you at all times and can react flexibly if things don't go like clockwork.

Safety & hygiene have top priority

The health, safety and security of our customers and business partners are currently more important than ever. For this reason, we have developed the Clean & Safe Protocol together with SGS, the world's leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company. Based on the Clean & Safe Label, you can see at first glance in the hotel results list whether a hotel meets extended hygiene measures. This makes traveling safe.


Contact

Convince yourself of our excellent HOTEL DE customer service. You can reach us around the clock.



You are not yet a HOTEL DE app user? Download the HOTEL DE app now!

descriptionShort: Easy hotel booking, attractive offers & exclusive benefits

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You can now log into HOTEL DE and HRS with one single profile and benefit from the offers in both portals

title: HOTEL DE

creator: HOTEL DE GmbH
descriptionHtml:
HOTEL DE in a fresh new look & now with even more benefits!

Find the perfect hotel with new filters and tailor your stay to your individual needs. In addition, you can now earn miles or points with every booking.

Your tailored hotel stay

Book what you need. Would you like to have breakfast included? Be able to cancel at short notice? Or pay when you arrive at the hotel? With our new features, you can select exactly the right room which fits your needs.

More filter options

Find the right hotel faster. We have improved the search function to make your hotel search even more personal. For example, you can filter by hotel chains, the business tariff with up to 30% savings or sustainable hotels. Save time and discover your dream destination faster!

Earn miles or points while you sleep

There are even more benefits as a myHOTEL DE member. Collect miles or points for every stay with our partners Miles & More and BahnBonus.

Contact us

If you would like to learn more, or have suggestions on how we can further improve the HOTEL DE App, please email us at info@hotel.de

Not yet a HOTEL DE App user? Download the App, and upgrade your travel experience today.
descriptionShort: Find the perfect hotel for your trip with the HOTEL DE app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're delighted to introduce our latest app release, packed with exciting enhancements to elevate your experience. Check out the following additions:

Tailored hotel stays, improved filter options and loyalty programs!

Find the perfect hotel with our new filters and tailor your stay to your individual needs. In addition, you will now receive miles or points with every booking.

descriptionShort: Find the perfect hotel for your trip with the HOTEL DE app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Book Faster, Easier, & More Personalised with HOTEL DE - We’re excited to bring you new features designed to make your booking experience even better!

New:
Favourite Hotel Lists: You can now group your favourite hotels into lists! This makes it easier to search within your favourites and share them with others.

Enjoy benefits for business travellers, including savings of up to 30% at top hotels, full flexibility even after booking, earn miles or points with each booking and 24/7 assistance.

descriptionShort: Find the perfect hotel for your trip with the HOTEL DE app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re excited to bring new features designed to make your booking experience with HOTEL DE even better!

Complex Search: Intuitively search for any specific information on the hotel details page: Amenities (e.g., "pets", "Wi-Fi", ..), Photos, Room offers, Policies, Reviews.

Hotel Gallery Filters: Easily filter for specific types of photos in the gallery by category, such as Restaurant, Room, Outdoor area.

Flexible Payment Options: You can choose between Pay now or Pay at the hotel.
